name: Simple Driving Game
description:
An experimental 'Game' where you drive a car around an obstacle course! 

Avoid hitting trees or going into the water, See if you can complete the course going over all obstacles and set up a stopwatch to see if you can get the best time! 

I created this game so I could develop some skills, notably

  • The best camera position for a third person controller 
  • Building terrain with the terrain editor tool, implementing trees and water
  • using mesh colliders to allow the user to traverse complex shapes i.e the Loop. 

I could have developed this game further, implementing checkpoints, a better and more clear road system. collectables and pick-up powerups for the car. i could have also set up a timer within unity that resets with each lap, allowing you to push for a better time.

if you have any other suggestions on what i could do with this simple game then please, leave a comment below!
